page.title: 11INTERESTING PEOPLE
page.content: Mr.Lee is a beekeeper.He showed us how the bees live and the way they make honey.The queen bee is the biggest bee but she doesn't rule them. If the bees want to leave a hive and she refuses to go the bees kill her. The beekeeper has to have special clothing to protect himself. Mr.England has kept canaries since he was ten. He likes their songs and colours.He breeds them every year. They lay eggs in June. Mr. Winter remembers when farming used to be done by hand. The farmers would have to get up at 4:30am and work a lot longer hours than our farmers do for a lot less pay. All the milking was done by hand instead of by new machines. The ground was ploughed by horses and then the crops were planted by hand, now they use machines. Mr. Winter has a collection of old farm implements from those days.
